Author: Ottermandias
Name: Accountant
Punchline: Character task timers.
Description: Keep track of retainer, airship, submersible, aetherial wheel and crop timers as well as several miscallaneous tasks of multiple characters.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Accurate CountDown
Description: Shows the current countdown time.

Author: Helios
Name: Adaptive Hud
Description:
Useful for ultrawide users, swapping from windowed/fullscreen will automatically switch your hudlayout.

/pah to configure
Punchline: Switches your /hudlayout when your game switches from windowed to fullscreen.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Adventurer in Need
Description: Recieve a notification when a duty roulette is in need of a role. /pbonus to setup
Punchline: Recieve a notification when a duty roulette is in need of a role.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Better Party Finder
Description:
Filter the party finder better.

All vanilla filtering is available, plus:

- Create filter presets to easily switch between
- Whitelist/blacklist specific duties and categories
- Add character names to hide PFs from
- Remove PFs above maximum item level
- Filter on item level range
- Filter on multiple jobs and slots (ex. MCH + GNB available)
Punchline: Use advanced Party Finder filter presets.

Author: d87
Name: BigPlayerDebuffs
Description: Scales up buffs/debuffs applied by you on Target Status frames

Author: ackwell
Name: Browser Host
Punchline: Dalamud plugin for in-game browser rendering.
Description:
Dalamud plugin for in-game browser rendering. Think OverlayPlugin, but it's in the game itself.
Use the settings button below or the '/bh config' command to configure.

Author: Styr1x
Name: Browsingway
Description:
Renders browser overlays in-game to enable playing in fullscreen (and G-SYNC) while having access to ACT overlays.
Use the settings button below or the '/bw config' command to configure.
Based on the BrowserHost plugin by ackwell.
Punchline: Browser overlays rendered in-game.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Burnt Toast
Description: Hides toast notifications you don't want to see.

Author: Caraxi & Ottermandias
Name: ChatAlerts
Punchline: Play sounds and highlight text based on defined filters.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Bubbles
Punchline: Enables in-game chat bubbles.
Description: Using native chat bubble display, see who is talking about what in a more natural fashion.
Changelog: Further stability Improvements. Added Yalm distance cap. Added an easter egg for a friend.

Author: kij
Name: ChatCoordinates
Description:
Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat.
Opens map with given coordinates for current or given zone.
See "/coord" for configuration and usage info.
Punchline: Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Extender
Description: This plugin adds functionality to FFXIV in-game chat.

Author: Franz
Name: ChatTyper
Description: Prefixes all chatbox messages with their chat type number and name, if known.
Punchline: This is still mostly a dev tool for debugging, but people like it?

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Chill Frames
Description: Tired of your GPU melting your face off while just running around? Why render at 240 FPS when you're just staring at that gathering node? Fret no more! Chill Frames allows you to limit the games framerate while out of combat!
Punchline: Limit Framerate while out of combat

Author: NotNite
Name: cl_showpos
Description: the source engine convar, implemented into FFXIV

Author: Chivalrik
Name: Compass
Description:
Check-out the repository for steps on how to report missing/wrong filter
and hiding options. Have a look at the FAQ tab in the config window
after install for common caveats.
Punchline: Monodimensional compass for your adventures.
Changelog:
- Update to APi 6, patch 6.1
- One more visibility option: 'Only in Combat'
- New Filter: 'Boss Enemy'
- New Filter: 'Poetics Vendor'
- fix: Waymark icons (thanks Maxunit)
- "fix": Dirty hack to prevent (?) Aesthetician crashes

Author: Lharz
Name: Currency Alert
Description: /currencyalert: shows the configuration panel.
Punchline: Display alerts upon reaching configurable currencies thresholds (such as Poetics or PVP marks).

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Daily Duty
Description: Automatically track and complete many daily and weekly tasks.
Punchline: Easily Track Daily and Weekly tasks.

Author: goat, modded by Franz
Name: Discord Chat Bridge
Description: This plugin allows you to receive your chat messages via Discord.
Punchline: Receive your chat messages via Discord.

Author: goat
Name: Wotsit
Description:
Adds a convenient quick search akin to Spotlight that lets you open game windows, teleport, find wiki articles, and more.
Press Control + T to open the search window. This can be changed by searching for "Wotsit Settings".
Punchline: Find anything, go anywhere, in style.

Author: Not Cara
Name: Ultrawide Cutscenes
Description:
This plugin removes the "letterboxing" bars when watching cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.
Beware! You may see things that you are not supposed to be seeing, such as upcoming NPCs popping in or T-posing.

Thanks to aers for finding this.
Punchline: Remove letterboxing from cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.

Author: goat
Name: Fancy Loading Screens
Description:
This plugin shows the destination zone's concept art while loading.
NOTE: ONLY LOOKS RIGHT ON 16:9 SCREENS! The concept art is not any bigger, and we can't expand/fix it. Sorry!
Punchline: Shows the destination zone's concept art while loading

Author: goat
Name: Discord Rich Presence
Description: This plugin allows you to show your zone, job, level, name, and world in your Discord status.
Punchline: Show your zone, job, level, name, and world in your Discord status
Changelog:
* Added party grouping support, will show people you group with on Discord if they also use the plugin
* Now shows AFK status by default, can be disabled
* Now shows queue position if Waitingway is installed

Author: goat
Name: Hey Dalamud!
Description:
The intelligent voice assistant for your FFXIV experience - teleport to places, open other plugins, the possibilities are limitless!
Just say "Hey Dalamud, help me!" to learn more.

Author: perchbird
Name: Damage Info
Description: Configurable options for in-game fly text color based on damage type, with additional settings for damage source and fly text decluttering options.
Punchline: Modifies in-game fly-text for more (or less) damage information.

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Death Recap
Description:
Quickly figure out what killed you or your party members!

Shows:
- Healing
- Damage taken
- Debuffs
- Buffs
- Barriers
- Addle, Feint, Reprisal on damage source

Author: Strati
Name: DeepDungeonDex
Description: A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon. Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, status vulnerabilities, and a general overview of notable mechanics. Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played. Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but I could use your help! Please open an issue on the GitHub if you'd like to correct inaccurate or untested data.
Punchline: Live monster data for Deep Dungeons.

Author: jdsmith2816
Name: DelvUI
Description: DelvUI provides a highly configurable HUD replacement and is highly inspired by ElvUI from WoW
Punchline: A modern HUD replacement built for customization.

Author: PGGB
Name: DeviceChangeFix
Description: Stops controller input from freezing randomly.
Punchline: Stops controller input from freezing randomly.

Author: ocealot
Name: EasyEyes
Punchline: Hide annoying or distracting VFXs
Description: A plugin which can hide any VFX. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: Dante Souza e Souza - aka lokinmodar
Name: Echoglossian
Description: Realtime game text translator
Punchline:
Dialogue and other in-game text translations? Yes we have!
Known Issues at: https://github.com/lokinmodar/Echoglossian/issues/12

Author: Felys
Name: EnemyListDebuffs
Description: Displays your debuffs on the enemy list. Original implementation credit to aers.

Author: Xorus
Name: EngageTimer
Description:
Finally, display all the numbers when starting a countdown!

Features :
- Big countdown that displays all the numbers
- Customizable big-number textures (default, yellow, WoW style or custom files)
- Display combat time in the Server Info Bar, and/or a floating window
- OBS browser-source compatible page with countdown and current combat duration

Why the OBS thing ? Well, it can be useful if you want a big stylized stopwatch in your recordings.
See repository for more info.

Feel free so send me feedback, bugs and potential improvements!
Punchline: Combat countdown with all numbers and pull timer (with a bonus OBS source)

Author: ascclemens
Name: Expanded Search Info
Description:
Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.

Support for:
- Any plain text URL
- Pastebin.com
- carrd.co/crd.co
- F-List
- Refsheet

Simply examine someone with a search info containing pointers to one of
these locations and the plugin will display information automatically.

Icon: expand by Gregor Cresnar from the Noun Project
Punchline: Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.

Author: shdwp
Name: Fader Plugin
Punchline: Automatically hides UI elements.
Description: Lets you automatically hide certain game UI elements based on number of conditions.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezFauxHollows
Description: This plugin highlights tiles in Faux Hollows that represent the best potential action you can take.
Punchline: Highlights recommended tiles in Faux Hollows for your next move.

Author: CFG
Name: FC Name Color
Description:
Color your FC’s tag or the entire nameplate if they are in your FC or other specified FCs.
Works using Lodestone data, so it can continue working inside duties as well as on different servers!
Punchline: Color your FC member’s FC tags

Author: Franz
Name: FlashOnTell
Description: Flash FFXIV's program on the taskbar when you receive a /tell. This plugin has no configurable settings at this time.
Punchline: Flash FFXIV's program on the taskbar when you receive a /tell

Author: Aireil
Name: FlyTextFilter
Description: Allows the filtering of the different fly text types.
Punchline: Allows the filtering of the different fly text types.

Author: Caraxi
Name: FPS Plugin
Description: Display game FPS. It really is that simple.
Punchline: Display game FPS.

Author: XIV Tools
Name: Fullscreen Toggle
Punchline: Enter and leave borderless windowed mode quickly!
Description: Enter and leave borderless windowed mode quickly! Press Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: GatherBuddy
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing.
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions.

Author: Chivalrik
Name: GentleTouch
Description:
You need to configure patterns and triggers before it will work, 
open the configuration window to do that. 
DS5 is currently unsupported. 
Currently supported triggers are:
- Cooldowns
- Near Aether Current
Punchline: Create vibration patterns for the controller and specify triggers to make it vibrate.
Changelog:
- Update to API 6
- Reworked charged abilities, those trigger now _only_ on first charge (instead of last as previous).

Author: ascclemens
Name: Glamaholic
Description:
Create and save as many glamour plates as you want. Activate up to 15 of them
at once at the Glamour Dresser. Supports exporting and importing plates for
easy sharing.
Punchline: Save and swap your glamour plates.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Globetrotter
Description:
Automatically shows where treasure maps are located.

Icon: Map by Adrien Coquet from the Noun Project
Punchline: Automatically shows where treasure maps are located.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Good Memory
Description:
Adds an indicator in item tooltips to show whether you have acquired that item.

This indicator is in the item's description near the bottom and only appears for
items that are unlockable, such as orchestrion rolls, minions, etc.

Square Enix say this plugin is impossible!

Icon: Server by Vectorstall from the Noun Project
Punchline: Adds an indicator in item tooltips to show whether you have acquired that item.

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: Harp Hero
Description:
Assist mode for bards who want to play music but don't know how to.
- does NOT play anything automatically
- needs MIDI files to work
- adapts MIDI tracks to fit in game limitations for you
- you will be scored :O
Punchline: Bard performance assistant

Author: perchbird
Name: Housemate
Description:
Housemate offers multiple features that help you gain inspiration from other homes in XIV.
If you're looking for a specific home or outdoor item, you can check the exterior list
when running around a ward. If you're interested in seeing what items make up a
structure in a home - turn on the item overlay to see what they are!

Note: This plugin is purely informational, and does not assist you in placing
or "glitching" housing items.
Punchline: Displays information about housing fixtures and objects.

Author: Critical_Impact
Name: Inventory Tools
Description:
Adds in a window that allows for the searching and filtering of items across your inventories and the entire games list of items. Adds visualisation in game to see both where your items are and where you should sort them.

Features are always being added to Inventory Tools so keep up to date to receive them. Some of the currently included features are:
	- Market board integration 
	- Item highlighting 
	- Various ways to filter items including have acquired, is craftable, is housing, any many more 
	- Browse all available game items
Punchline: Can't find an item you thought you had? Can't work out why your retainers are so full? This might help.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Item Search
Description:
Filterable search for Items and Key Items.
Try on any item without having to find someone to link it.
Punchline: Search and link items, even if you don't have them.

Author: ocealot
Name: JobBars
Punchline: Extra job gauges
Description: Additional job gauges, party buff timers, mitigation trackers, and more. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: haplo, daemitus
Name: JobIcons
Description: Names are dumb, use icons instead.

Author: Eternita
Name: JustBackup
Description: This plugin automatically backups your game and plugin configurations upon game/plugin starting.
Punchline: Automatically backup your game and plugin configuration.

Author: kalilistic
Name: Kapture
Description:
Kapture is a loot tracker to capture drops, obtained items, rolls, and more.
Use the roll monitor to see who you are waiting on to roll.
Punchline: Track your loot.

Author: Gotest
Name: Kingdom Hearts UI Bars
Description:
A plugin that makes Kingdom Hearts UI stuff, such as a health bar for the player.
If you have any questions, issues or suggestions, please post an issue in the github or ping me in the Discord!
Punchline: HP bar, MP bar, EXP bar, oh my!
Changelog:
API 6 Compatibility
-Fixed the lines in the ring bars when scaled up.
-Fixed the positioning of the class icon and level text when scaling.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Macro Chain
Description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro' but this command cannot be used while macros are running.
Punchline: Run multiple macros one after the other.

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MapLinker
Punchline: Record the maplinks in chat
Description: Automatically record the maplinks in chat and retrieval later.

Author: fmauNeko
Name: Market board
Description: Browse the market board. /pmb to open.
Punchline: Browse the market board from anywhere.

Author: Eternita
Name: Mini
Description: Additionally can minimize game to tray or create game's tray icon
Punchline: Adds a button and a command to minimize your game into taskbar

Author: daemitus
Name: ezMiniCactpot
Description: This plugin highlights tiles and lines in MiniCactpot that represent the best potential action you can take.
Punchline: Shows the next best move in Mini Cactpot.

Author: attick
Name: Mouseover Action
Punchline: Mo' actions no problems
Description: This plugin lets you target friends or enemies like a macro, without the clunkiness of a macro. /pmoaction opens the configuration.

Author: Marconsou
Name: MP Tick Bar
Description:
-Fast Fire III marker on the bar.
-Autostarts the bar before combat starts.
-Countdown with time offset.
-Compatible with FFXIV Material UI.
Punchline: Visually tracks MP regeneration ticks (Black Mage only).

Author: aers, JHerig
Name: NamePlateDebuffs
Description: Displays your debuffs on enemy nameplates.
Punchline: Displays debuffs you cast on nameplates of enemies

Author: ascclemens
Name: Namingway
Description: Rename abilities and status effects.
Punchline: Rename abilities and status effects.

Author: kalilistic, karashiiro
Name: NeatNoter
Description: NeatNoter allows you to take notes without switching windows or any of that.
Punchline: A note-taking plugin.

Author: ascclemens
Name: NoSoliciting
Description:
Customisable chat and Party Finder filtering. In addition to letting
you filter anything from chat and PF, it comes with built-in filters
for the following:

- RMT (both gil and content)
- FC ads
- RP ads
- Phishing messages
- Static recruitment
- Trade ads
- Community ads
- Any PF with an item level over the max
Punchline: Adblock for FFXIV.

Author: MidoriKami
Name: No Tank You
Description: Displays a warning on your screen if any partymembers or yourself are missing a critical action such as Dance Partner, Kadrion, Scholar Faerie, or Tank Stance. Helpful for learning or teaching others how to use these actions.
Punchline: Warns you if players are missing critical role actions

Author: Eternita
Name: NotificationMaster
Description: Notifies you about various events while your game is minimized.

Author: Avaflow
Name: Oops, All Lalafells!
Description:
Turn everyone around you into Lalafells (or other races!)

Use /poal to open settings.
Punchline: That one funny plugin your friend told you about.

Author: Meli & perchbird
Name: Orchestrion Plugin
Description:
Orchestrion Plugin allows you to change the currently playing in-game BGM. It includes
a curated list of the most accurate in-game song titles, so you know exactly what's playing,
if you want to know later! Add favorite songs to separate them from the rest.
Note: This plugin does not currently allow you to play actual orchestrion songs.
Punchline: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.

Author: goat, modded by Franz
Name: OwO
Description: This plugin uwu's your chat.
Punchline: owo for your chat

Author: shdwp, maintained by Avaflow
Name: PartyIcons
Description:
Adjusts player nameplates base on current content. For example you can display raid positions (that are assigned automatically by listening to the chat), job icons, or names with job icons.

Reverse-engineering effort achived by authors of JobIcons: haplo, daemitus, Loskh, wozaiha, without them this plugin would not be possible!
Punchline: Replace names with job icons, raid role positions and more!

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: Pat Me
Description: Did you ever wonder how many times your Lala gets a pat? Well, now you can count it!
Punchline: Pat counter

Author: ascclemens
Name: Peeping Tom
Description: Shows who is currently or was previously targeting you.
Punchline: Shows who is currently or was previously targeting you.

Author: tesu
Name: Penny Pincher
Description:
Plugin for simplifying "pennying" (undercutting current lowest offer by 1).

The usual workflow for this is the following:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Take a mental note of what the current lowest offer is
4. Subtract one from it
5. Close the current listings window
6. Update your item's price with the number you noted
7. Confirm your new price

This plugin eliminates the mental notekeeping steps in the middle by automatically copying the number you want onto your clipboard when you open the current listings window.  

Therefore, your new workflow becomes this:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Close the current listings window
4. Paste the undercut value in
5. Confirm your new price

This both speeds up the process and reduces room for error from typos.
Punchline: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices

Author: karashiiro
Name: PingPlugin
Description: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Pixel Perfect
Punchline: Reveals your hitbox, and an optional ring.
Description: Showing exactly where to stand since 2020.

Author: r00telement
Name: Player Tags
Description: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.

Author: kalilistic
Name: PlayerTrack
Description:
PlayerTrack helps you keep a record of who you meet and the content you played together.
Organize players into categories, keep notes, and track them across name/world changes.
Customization options include colors, icons, nameplates, and alerts.
Punchline: Keep track of players you meet.

Author: perchbird
Name: PrefPro
Description:
Your character is personal, so you should be able to have NPCs refer to them
the way that you want. With PrefPro, you can control which text option
will appear when an NPC uses dialogue meant for a specific in-game gender.
This allows you to use a female player model and be referred to as male, and
vice versa. In addition, there are a few name customization options - if you
want to only be referred to by your last name, so be it.
Note: This plugin currently will not swap voiced cutscene dialogue.
Punchline: Changes in-game dialogue to reference your desired gender and name.

Author: kalilistic
Name: PriceCheck
Description:
To check prices, hold your keybind and then hover over an item or via the item's context menu.
The prices are pulled from the crowd-sourced site Universalis.
Punchline: Quickly price check your items.

Author: UnknownX
Name: QoL Bar
Punchline: Customizable ImGui hotbars
Description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Quest Map
Description:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Icons: treasure map by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project and
locked book by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project
Punchline: Explore quests and their rewards.

Author: Eternita, Chalkos
Name: QuestAWAY
Description: Removes unwanted icons from your map. Not only quests, any icons.
Punchline: Removes unwanted icons from your map.

Author: srkizer
Name: Quote of the Lobby
Description: Displays a random dialogue, and/or the datacenter you'll be connecting to when you press GAME START.
Punchline: Simmer does the light before every login.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Ready Check Helper
Punchline: Extends the game's built-in ready check.
Description: Displays the names of the players that were not ready in chat following the completion of a ready check, and optionally adds ready check status icons over the party and alliance lists.

Author: Cair
Name: Redirect
Description: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros, sprint, and potions! Type /redirect to configure.
Punchline: Change where your actions are going, queue macros, queue sprint, and queue potions!

Author: Caraxi
Name: Remind Me
Description: UI for showing countdowns for status effects and ability cooldowns.
Punchline: Cooldown and Status tracking.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Remote Party Finder Uploader
Description:
Uploads the PF listings you retrieve to the crowdsourced Remote
Party Finder website (https://xivpf.com/).
Punchline: Crowdsourced PF website (upload PF listings to xivpf.com)

Author: Chalkos
Name: RepairMe
Description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted. /repairme to config
Punchline: Never forget to repair & extract materia again!
Changelog:
* v1.0.1.8
  * fix a wrong spiritbond marker at 0% that was showing for equipment slots that have no item

Author: akira0245
Name: Reset enmity command
Description: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.
Punchline: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: RezPls
Punchline: Highlighting of Raises and detrimental status effects.
Description: Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who, who is already resurrected, and who has removable detrimental status effects in the world as well as in the group or alliance interface.

Author: kalilistic
Name: SillyChat
Description:
Allows you to translate player and NPC chat messages/bubbles.
Supported languages include: Pirate, Urianger, Leet, Pig Latin, and Turkey.
Punchline: Make chat more fun with translations like pirate and urianger.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks Plugin
Description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)
Punchline: This was supposed to be simple...

Author: ocealot
Name: SkillSwap
Punchline: Skill mod creator
Description: Create animation replacement mods for Textools or Penumbra. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: Haplo064
Name: SlideCast
Description: Adds an indicator of when it's safe to move while casting

Author: Vielle Janlenoux
Name: Snooper
Description: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.
Punchline: See chat messages from your current target in a separate window.

Author: Sonar Team
Name: Sonar
Punchline: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays.
Description: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. This plugin is closed source and support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.
Changelog: See the Sonar Support discord #announcements channel for more information

Author: ascclemens
Name: Sound Filter
Description:
Filters any sound or set of sounds from the game.

- Remove a battle sound effect you don't like
- Remove specific emote sounds
- Remove specific background music

Icons: filter by Kirby Wu from the Noun Project
and Sound by Gregor Cresnar from the Noun Project
Punchline: Filter any game sound.

Author: karashiiro
Name: SoundSetter
Description: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.

Author: Pohky
Name: Teleporter
Description:
Adds Chat Commands to Teleport to Aetherytes or Areas by Name.
e.g. /tp Quarrymill or /tpm South Shroud
Supports setting up an Alias for Aetherytes to be used with Teleporter Commands
e.g. /tp home instead of /tp Estate Hall (Free Company)
Punchline: Chat Commands for Teleporting

Author: ascclemens
Name: Text Box Styler
Description: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.
Punchline: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.

Author: karashiiro
Name: TextToTalk
Description: Chat TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.

Author: ascclemens
Name: The Great Separator
Description:
Add separators to various numbers.

- Damage/healing numbers (not DoTs or other players' numbers)
- Party list HP
- Ability costs on hotbars
- Ability costs in tooltips
Punchline: Add separators to various numbers.

Author: ascclemens
Name: The Heart of the Party
Description:
The Heart of the Party is a remake of the in-game title picker, but it
supports searching. Note that it doesn't add a command to set your title; use
the built-in /title command instead.
Punchline: Set your character's title - now with Searchalin!

Author: Nadya
Name: Tidy Chat
Description: Filters most of the game's spammy messages away. Condense earned commendations into a single line, autocopy /say text for most quests, block emote spam and more.
Punchline: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.

Author: kalilistic
Name: Tippy
Description:
Developed by goat for April Fools 2021 and unnecessarily resurrected by kal.

Handcrafted by our finest code artisans with special AI, 
he will analyze your playstyle to give you useful tips to get your GAMING to the next level.

Some things he can do:
* He can give general tips about the game
* He can give tips about the job you're playing
* He can report on your battle performance
* He will respect your feelings
Punchline: Tippy, your new FFXIV virtual assistant.

Author: attick & perchbird
Name: Title Edit
Description:
Create your own custom title screen of your favorite location in-game, and open the game right up to that spot every time.
Includes a number of preinstalled title screens for you to use or get inspiration from, and an easy to use importer to
use title screens that others have shared!
Punchline: Create, share, and shuffle custom title screens for FFXIV.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Tourist
Description:
Tourist adds a window to assist with the sightseeing log.

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

Icon: sightseeing by muhammad from the Noun Project
Punchline: Finish your sightseeing log.

Author: Tischel
Name: TPie
Description: Highly configurable hotbars that can be toggled with a keybind. They can be filled with Actions, Items, Gear Sets or Macros.
Punchline: Customizable ring-shaped hotbars
Changelog:
1.3.1.0
- Added buttons to sort rings in the list.
- Fixed quick action setting being transferred to another item when deleting or moving items.
- Fixed quick actions showing a selection background when the setting is disabled.
- Fixed crash when attempting to move an item without having a selected item.

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: TriadBuddy
Description:
Triple triad solver, NPC matches only.
- highlights next move during mini game
- evaluates all deck presets before match
- deck optimizer for NPC
- adds more details to card collection window
Punchline: Triple triad solver

Author: ocealot
Name: VFXEditor
Punchline: VFX editor and viewer
Description: View and modify vfxs, as well as create mods for them. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: Dragon
Name: Visibility
Description:
Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp
Punchline: Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.

Author: Haplo064
Name: VoidList
Description: Completely removes chosen players from your game.

Author: Avaflow
Name: Waitingway
Description:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it into the game, as
well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your login queue times to crowdsource information
about FFXIV server load. This information will be publicly available in the future; check the Discord for updates!

Future planned features include login wait time estimates, as well as duty queue time statistics, and a website
showing all of this information.

Discord URL: https://discord.waitingway.com
Punchline: Crowdsourced FFXIV login queue times, now with Discord queue notification features.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Waymark Preset Plugin
Punchline: Improved Waymark Management
Description: Allows you to save, edit, place, import, export, and preview an unlimited number of waymark presets.

Author: Eternita
Name: Weatherman
Punchline: Allows precise control over time and weather per zone or globally.

Author: Haplo064, maintained by Franz
Name: WOLdo
Description: Movable text overlay of the current location name.
Punchline: Making it easier to know where you are.

Author: Azure Gem
Name: Window Title Changer
Description: Allows you to change your game window title

Author: daemitus
Name: ezWondrousTails
Description: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.
Punchline: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.

Author: Lady Defile
Name: Wordsmith
Description: Wordsmith is a text editor with roleplayers in mind. It automatically breaks your text up for easy copy/paste, has advanced features, spellcheck, and even a thesaurus.
Punchline: A roleplay thesaurus and scratch pad.

Author: ascclemens
Name: XIVChat Server
Description:
XIVChat is a suite of software allowing you to use FFXIV's chat from
different devices. This is the server component required to do so.

For information about clients to use with this server, see the website.

Author: attick
Name: XIV Combo
Punchline: PvP, but in PvE.
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu

Author: Kaz Wolfe
Name: XIVDeck Game Plugin
Description:
This plugin allows players to place virtually any hotbar-able action onto a Stream Deck, including hotbar slots themselves. Actions are called directly, meaning no keybinds or awkward settings are necessary.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe#2896 in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
Punchline: Integrate your Stream Deck with Final Fantasy XIV!

Author: Cadaeix
Name: XIVLogger
Description: Save chat logs as text files from when this is loaded. /xivlogger for settings, /savelog to save logs, /copylogs to copy logs.
Punchline: Save chat logs to your computer as text files or copy them!

Author: daemitus
Name: ZodiacBuddy
Description: This plugin attempts to help you complete your Zodiac weapon in various ways.
Punchline: Complete your Zodiac relic with style.

Author: Left
Name: ACT Endcounter
Description: Pairs with ACT, automatically invokes 'end' at the end of combat. Additional options to invoke 'end' at the start of combat as well. Plus an option to clear your entire encounter when entering a duty.
Punchline: Ends your encounters with ACT

Author: yomishino
Name: Aether Compass
Description:
This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.
Punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs

Author: UnknownX
Name: A Realm Recorded
Punchline: Allows you to use the duty recorder
Description: Adds additional features to the duty recorder and automatically starts it in most instances. Please make sure the setting is enabled inside "/record".

Author: zhudotexe
Name: PaissaHouse
Description:
Looking for that perfect house? PaissaHouse lets you receive notifications when a new plot of land is up for sale on your home world.

Want to contribute? Check out the repository (globe icon below) for instructions.
Punchline: Chat alerts for player housing.

Author: Icehunter
Name: AutoTranslateXIV
Description: Translates Stuff
Punchline: Translates From A to B where A/B are set in config.

Author: Kaz Wolfe
Name: BatteryGauge
Description:
Hey, you! Yes, you! Do you play FFXIV on your laptop? Or are you so addicted to FFXIV that you have a UPS on your desktop just so you can keep playing through power outages? Then this is the plugin for you!

BatteryGauge adds a battery indicator to your server info bar showing your current battery percentage and expected remaining lifespan (as reported by Windows).
Punchline: Keep track of your FFXIV device's battery.

Author: Sl0nderman
Name: Blue Mage Helper
Description: Adds monster names and coordinates to the "Where to Learn" section of your blue mage spellbook.
Punchline: Helps you fill our your Blue Mage Spellbook

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Character Panel Refined
Description: Refine the character panel to display useful information like crit and direct hit chance

Author: Azure Gem
Name: CharSync
Punchline: Synchronize characters data
Description: Synchronize characters data automatically upon changing zones and logout, and allows to define multiple character groups to synchronize with. This is based upon goat's work, without using native hooks

Author: Arrest Everybody
Name: ChatEmoteColor
Description: A simple plugin that recolors emote chat lines depending on who is executing the emote and their target.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Translator
Punchline: Enables in-game chat translation.
Description: Automatically translating text in your chat-box, from various languages to one you specify.

Author: ItsBexy
Name: CrossUp
Description:
This plugin provides various customizations for the look and feel of the Cross Hotbar.

-Split up the left/right hotbars
-Display Expanded Hold Controls Separately
-Customize colors and element positions
-Greater control over which sets your extra bars are mapped to
Punchline: Customize the Cross Hotbar!

Author: goat
Name: Character Data Sync
Description:
This plugin allows you to use your character data from your main character on all others.

In-game, use the configuration menu to choose your main character, the restart the game to start syncing!
Punchline: Sync your character data from your main character to all others

Author: Infi
Name: Death Roll Helper
Description:
Plugin to help with any of your /random|/dice games 

    + Support for multiple sorting types (min, max, nearest to) 
    + Highlight numbers based on regex matching 
    + Block players from partaking in any of your games 
    + Accept only /random or /dice 
    + Easily remove players from the result table 

 And alot of more planned feature in future updates
Punchline: Easy to use deathroll/roll game helper with functions to hightlight or block players

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Distance
Punchline: Target distance widgets.
Description: Displays the distance in yalms to the target (or optionally to the target's ring), and can display distance until aggro range for supported bosses.

Author: Roselyn
Name: Elden Ring April Fools
Punchline: Recreation of the Elden Ring April Fools joke.
Description: Currently under development with extra features, should currently function as the April Fools joke did.

Author: BiscuitUmU, Kazumi
Name: Fantasy Player
Description:
Control Spotify playback from within FFX|V
Use the button below to open settings or use the '/pfp settings' command.

Author: Khloe Leclair
Name: Gearset Helper Plugin
Description: Displays extra information about a character's gearsets when Examine is open, and makes it easy to export gearsets to Etro or Ariyala.
Punchline: Display estimated stats with Examine, and export gear to Etro/Ariyala.

Author: Fr4nsson
Name: Hide Padlock
Description:
Allows you to toggle the visibility of the padlock that is next to hotbar one.

Use /padlock to toggle visibility.
Use //padlock to open settings.
Punchline: Hides the padlock.

Author: Necoji (prev. ascclemens)
Name: HUD Manager
Description:
Take total control over your HUD.

- Save infinite HUD layouts
- Swap between HUD layouts based on conditions
- Make child layouts that only affect desired HUD elements
- Change visibility of job gauges
- Export and import layouts from text

Author: Dragon
Name: Hunt Buddy
Description: A daily hunt bill tracker
Punchline: Helps you track your daily hunt bills

Author: electr0sheep
Name: Item Vendor Location
Description: Adds a context menu option for items that will show you where to find items you can buy off a vendor
Punchline: Shows you where to buy vendor items

Author: Infi
Name: Easy MBHistory
Description: Copies the marketboard transaction history into your clipboard with configurable options.
Punchline: Useful for when you want to quickly export marketboard transaction history.

Author: Samuelka
Name: Mount Collectioner
Punchline: Plugin for track collected mounts
Description: A plugin allows you to track received mounts by character.

Author: Gotest
Name: Mouse Target Tooltip
Description: A plugin that shows a tooltip for mouseover targets.
Punchline: Shows a tooltip with a little information for characters that the mouse is over.

Author: Talim
Name: MPTimer
Description: Simple MP timer status bar for black mages. Shows the time until your next MP tick, and optionally shows a marker indicating when it is safe to cast Fire III without losing an MP tick.

Author: Kaminaris
Name: NextUIPlugin
Description: OverlayPlugin replacement for Dalamud, works similarly to BrowserHost with addition to having more options and built in websocket server.
Punchline: OverlayPlugin for Dalamud with built in HUD replacement

Author: Bluefissure
Name: No Kill Plugin
Description: A simple plugin that prevent the game from killing itself.

Author: Bluefissure
Name: OBSPlugin
Description: A plugin to control OBS by websocket.

Author: Sl0nderman
Name: Ocean Fishin'
Description:
Automatically recommends bait to use based on your ocean fishing route. 
You'll get suggestions for spectral fish, fisher's intuition buff, and missions.
Punchline: Suggests bait for ocean fishing.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Party List Layout
Description: Customize the layout of the party list.
Punchline: Customize the layout of the party list.

Author: Sevii
Name: Better Housing
Description: Select furniture based on what you see instead of a massive box. Always active indoors, doens't work outdoors, there's no config menu.
Punchline: Furniture selection that actually works properly

Author: srkizer
Name: ResetAudio
Description: Resets game audio device on demand.
Punchline: Do not let the game shut up.

Author: perchbird
Name: ResLogger2.Plugin
Description: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.

Author: Dragon
Name: Side HUD
Description: Provides fancy side HUD

Author: rennerdo30
Name: SimpleCompare
Description: Show simple item comparison when pressing SHIFT and hovering over item
Punchline: Simple item comparison

Author: joshua.software.dev
Name: Size Matters when Fishing
Description: Provides labels to tell exactly how large fish are and how quickly they are moving while spearfishing.
Punchline: For the size evaluation challenged.

Author: wozaiha
Name: SkillDisplay
Punchline: Show the skills you used in the past few seconds.
Description: Show the skills you used in the past few seconds.

Author: SupineSnail (Tinuviel)
Name: Job Gauge Adjustments
Description: Just a simple plugin to allow you to tweak parts of job gauges.
Punchline: Simple Job Gauges... but you can tweak them now!

Author: Avaflow
Name: TabTab
Description: Customise the behaviour of tab targeting. Use /ptab to open configuration.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Say What?
Punchline: Persistent NPC Flavor Text
Description: Prints NPC chat bubbles to the chat log.

Author: cassandra308
Name: Where am I again?
Description: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in up in the corner next to the server and time info. Open config with /waia.
Punchline: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in next to the server info.
